docs.title: VibeGuide AI: Your AI-Powered Cultural Compass
Transform Your Travel Experience
docs.text:
Ever felt that slight panic, that moment of hesitation in a new country? Wondering if you're about to accidentally offend someone, misread a situation, or just look completely out of place? We all have.

Traditional guidebooks give you facts; VibeGuide AI gives you fluency.

docs.title: What is VibeGuide AI?
docs.text:
VibeGuide AI isn't just another travel app—it's your personal AI-driven cultural interpreter, designed to demystify the nuances of human interaction, wherever you are in the world.

Imagine stepping into any culture, not as a bewildered tourist, but as an informed, respectful, and confident explorer. That's the power of VibeGuide AI.

docs.title: 🌍 Cultural Intelligence at Your Fingertips
docs.text:
Our advanced AI understands the subtle art of cultural navigation, helping you:

  • Navigate social situations with confidence
  • Understand local customs and unwritten rules
  • Communicate respectfully across cultural boundaries
  • Avoid cultural faux pas before they happen

docs.title: ✨ Key Features
docs.text:
Real-Time GuidancePersonalized LearningOffline SupportCommunity Insights

Get instant cultural insights and etiquette tips based on your current location and situation.

Our AI adapts to your travel style and learns from your preferences to provide tailored advice.

Access essential cultural information even without internet connectivity.

Benefit from real experiences shared by fellow travelers and local experts.

docs.title: Why Choose VibeGuide AI?
docs.text:
Confidence in Every Interaction

Transform from uncertain tourist to culturally-aware traveler with AI-powered insights that help you navigate any social situation.

Beyond Traditional Guidebooks

While guidebooks tell you what to see, VibeGuide AI teaches you how to experience it authentically and respectfully.

Learn as You Go

Every interaction becomes a learning opportunity, building your cultural intelligence for future travels.

docs.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
docs.text:
• Get Started

    Jump right in with our quick setup guide and start exploring with confidence.

    Getting Started

  • Explore Features

    Discover all the ways VibeGuide AI can enhance your travel experience.

docs.title: Join the Community
docs.text:
Connect with fellow travelers and share your cultural discoveries:

  • GitHub: Contribute to our open-source initiatives
  • Twitter: Follow us for travel tips and cultural insights
  • Community Forum: Share experiences and get advice from other users

docs.title: Getting Started with VibeGuide AI
docs.text: Welcome to your journey toward confident, culturally-aware travel! This guide will help you set up VibeGuide AI and start exploring the world with newfound confidence.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
New to VibeGuide AI?

This guide assumes you're starting fresh. If you're already familiar with the basics, jump to Advanced Features.

docs.title: Step 1: Installation
docs.text:
Choose your preferred platform to get started:

Mobile AppWeb ApplicationAPI Integration

iOS 

Download from the App Store
Search for "VibeGuide AI"

Android 

Download from Google Play Store
Search for "VibeGuide AI"

Visit app.vibeguide.ai in your browser

Browser Compatibility

VibeGuide AI works best with modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

For developers looking to integrate VibeGuide AI: 

npm install @vibeguide/ai-sdk

See our API Documentation for detailed integration guides.

docs.title: Step 2: Create Your Account
docs.text:
1. Sign Up: Use your email or social login
  2. Verify: Check your email for verification link
  3. Profile Setup: Tell us about your travel preferences

Privacy First

We only collect information necessary to provide personalized cultural insights. Your data is encrypted and never shared without permission.

docs.title: Step 3: Set Your Destination
docs.text:
1. Current Location: Allow location access for real-time insights
  2. Travel Plans: Add your upcoming destinations
  3. Interests: Select what matters most to you (food, business, social events, etc.)

docs.title: Your First Cultural Insight
docs.text: Let's get you your first piece of cultural intelligence:

docs.title: Scenario: Greeting Someone New
docs.text:
1. Open VibeGuide AI
  2. Ask: "How should I greet someone in [your destination]?"
  3. Receive: Personalized guidance based on:
  4. Local customs
  5. Time of day
  6. Business vs. social context
  7. Your personal style

Sample Interaction

You: "I'm meeting a business contact in Tokyo tomorrow morning. How should I greet them?"

VibeGuide AI: "In Japanese business culture, a respectful bow (15-30 degrees) is appropriate for first meetings. If they extend their hand for a handshake, follow their lead. Arrive 5-10 minutes early, and have your business card ready to exchange with both hands. The depth of your bow should match theirs—this shows respect and cultural awareness."

docs.title: 🎯 Situation-Specific Guidance
docs.text:
Ask about specific scenarios you'll encounter:

  • "What's appropriate to wear to dinner in [destination]?"
  • "How do I politely decline an invitation here?"
  • "What topics should I avoid in conversation?"

docs.title: 🗺️ Location-Based Insights
docs.text:
Enable location services to get:

  • Real-time cultural tips based on where you are
  • Nearby cultural experiences worth exploring
  • Local etiquette reminders for your current context

docs.title: 📚 Personal Learning Path
docs.text:
VibeGuide AI creates a customized learning experience:

  • Cultural Competency Score: Track your progress
  • Daily Insights: Learn something new each day
  • Situation Practice: Role-play scenarios before you encounter them

docs.title: Setting Up Offline Access
docs.text:
Stay Connected Anywhere

Download essential cultural packs before traveling to areas with limited internet connectivity.

docs.title: Download Cultural Packs
docs.text:
1. Go to Settings → Offline Content
  2. Select your destination countries
  3. Choose content types:
  4. Essential etiquette
  5. Common phrases
  6. Emergency cultural guidance
  7. Download (requires WiFi for large packs)

docs.title: Offline Features Available
docs.text:
• ✅ Basic cultural guidelines
  • ✅ Essential phrases and their cultural context
  • ✅ Emergency etiquette situations
  • ❌ Real-time AI conversations (requires internet)
  • ❌ Location-specific insights (requires GPS + internet)

docs.title: Notification Preferences
docs.text:
Configure when and how VibeGuide AI reaches out:

  • Location-triggered tips: Get insights when entering new areas
  • Pre-event reminders: Cultural prep before meetings or events
  • Daily learning: Optional daily cultural insights
  • Emergency alerts: Important cultural warnings

docs.title: Learning Style
docs.text:
Tell VibeGuide AI how you prefer to learn:

Visual LearnerPractical LearnerContext Learner
  • Infographics and visual guides
  • Video demonstrations
  • Cultural comparison charts
  • Step-by-step instructions
  • Real-world scenarios
  • Practice exercises
  • Historical background
  • Cultural reasoning
  • Deep-dive explanations

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
Now that you're set up, explore these areas:

  1. Cultural Intelligence Features - Understand how our AI works
  2. Real-time Guidance - Make the most of location-based insights
  3. Advanced Features - Power user tips and tricks

docs.title: Need Help?
docs.text:
Questions?

  • Check our FAQ for common questions
  • Join our Community Forum
  • Contact support@vibeguide.ai

Ready to explore the world with confidence? Your cultural compass is now calibrated and ready to guide you through any situation, anywhere in the world.

Happy travels, and remember: every interaction is an opportunity to build bridges across cultures! 🌍✨

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: hello, why so serious, (please work😭!)

docs.title: Cultural Intelligence Engine
docs.text: VibeGuide AI's Cultural Intelligence Engine is the heart of our platform, powered by advanced AI that understands the nuanced world of cross-cultural communication and behavior.

docs.title: How It Works
docs.text:
Our AI has been trained on vast datasets of cultural information, including:

  • Anthropological research from leading universities
  • Real traveler experiences and feedback
  • Local expert insights from around the world
  • Historical cultural context and evolution

docs.title: The Intelligence Behind the Insights
docs.text:
Pattern RecognitionContextual UnderstandingContinuous Learning

Our AI identifies cultural patterns and variations across: - Geographic regions - Social contexts - Business vs. personal interactions - Generational differences

Every piece of advice considers: - Your background and experience - The specific situation you're in - Local variations within countries - Current cultural trends

The system improves through: - User feedback and corrections - New cultural research integration - Real-world outcome analysis - Community contributions

docs.title: 🎭 Social Situation Analysis
docs.text:
Understanding the unwritten rules of social interaction:

Business Meeting in Germany

Context: First business meeting with German colleagues

AI Analysis: - Punctuality is crucial (arrive exactly on time) - Direct communication is valued over small talk - Formal titles and surnames until invited otherwise - Firm handshakes with eye contact - Prepare for detailed, fact-based discussions

docs.title: 🍽️ Dining Etiquette Intelligence
docs.text:
Navigate food culture with confidence:

  • Table manners specific to each culture
  • Ordering etiquette and appropriate choices
  • Payment customs and tipping practices
  • Dietary restrictions communication
  • Social aspects of shared meals

docs.title: 💼 Professional Protocol
docs.text:
Master business culture anywhere:

  • Meeting structures and expectations
  • Communication styles (direct vs. indirect)
  • Hierarchy respect and protocol
  • Gift-giving appropriateness
  • Follow-up cultural norms

docs.title: 🏠 Personal Space & Gestures
docs.text:
Understand non-verbal communication:

  • Physical proximity comfort levels
  • Gesture meanings and taboos
  • Eye contact cultural significance
  • Touch boundaries in different contexts
  • Facial expressions interpretation

docs.title: Cultural Adaptation Scoring
docs.text:
Track your cultural competency with our proprietary scoring system:

Cultural Fluency Score: 85/100
├── Communication Style: 90/100
├── Social Awareness: 80/100  
├── Business Protocol: 85/100
└── Local Customs: 85/100

docs.title: Predictive Cultural Insights
docs.text:
Our AI anticipates situations you might encounter:

Proactive Guidance

"Based on your itinerary, you'll likely encounter these cultural situations in the next 24 hours..."

docs.title: Cultural Comparison Engine
docs.text:
Understand differences between cultures you know and new ones:

Your Culture → New CultureSimilarity MappingKey Differences

Compare familiar practices with local customs

Find common ground between cultures

Highlight the most important distinctions

docs.title: Quality Assurance
docs.text:
• Expert Review: All cultural insights reviewed by regional experts
  • Community Validation: User feedback helps verify accuracy
  • Regular Updates: Cultural information updated as societies evolve
  • Source Transparency: References to authoritative cultural sources

docs.title: Handling Cultural Complexity
docs.text:
Cultural Nuance

We recognize that culture isn't monolithic. Our AI accounts for: - Regional variations within countries - Individual differences within cultures - Evolving cultural norms - Generational gaps - Urban vs. rural distinctions

docs.title: Continuous Improvement
docs.text:
Our Cultural Intelligence Engine evolves through:

  1. User Feedback Loop: Rate the accuracy of advice received
  2. Outcome Tracking: Learn from successful cultural interactions
  3. Expert Partnerships: Collaborate with cultural anthropologists
  4. Research Integration: Incorporate latest cultural studies

docs.title: Getting the Most from Cultural Intelligence
Best Practices
docs.text:
1. Provide Context: The more specific your situation, the better the advice
  2. Ask Follow-ups: Dig deeper into cultural reasoning
  3. Share Feedback: Help improve accuracy for everyone
  4. Practice Scenarios: Use the AI to rehearse cultural situations

docs.title: Example Interactions
docs.text:
Effective Query

Good: "I'm attending a wedding in rural India as a Western guest. What should I wear and what gifts are appropriate?"

Better: "I'm a 30-year-old American woman attending a traditional Hindu wedding in Rajasthan. The ceremony is in the morning, followed by an evening reception. What should I wear to each event, and what gifts would be meaningful but appropriate for someone from outside the culture?"

The Cultural Intelligence Engine transforms cultural uncertainty into confident, respectful interactions—helping you connect authentically with people from any background.

docs.title: Real-Time Cultural Guidance
docs.text: Experience the power of instant cultural intelligence wherever you are. VibeGuide AI's real-time guidance system provides contextual insights based on your location, situation, and immediate needs.

docs.title: GPS-Powered Insights
docs.text:
When you enable location services, VibeGuide AI automatically provides:

  • Neighborhood-specific cultural norms
  • Venue-appropriate behavior guidance
  • Local variation awareness within cities
  • Cultural hotspot identification and preparation

Real-Time Scenario

Location: Traditional tea house in Kyoto

Automatic Guidance: - Remove shoes at entrance - Sit in seiza position or cross-legged - Wait for tea ceremony explanation - Appreciate the seasonal elements (flowers, scroll) - Speak in hushed tones

docs.title: Contextual Triggers
docs.text:
Smart notifications based on:

Time of DayDay of WeekSeasonal Awareness
  • Morning greeting customs
  • Lunch etiquette variations
  • Evening social protocols
  • Late-night cultural considerations
  • Weekend vs. weekday differences
  • Religious observance days
  • Market days and local rhythms
  • Cultural event schedules
  • Festival periods and customs
  • Weather-appropriate behavior
  • Seasonal gift-giving traditions
  • Holiday-specific protocols

docs.title: Smart Context Detection
docs.text:
Our AI recognizes when you're likely in specific situations:

Business District → Professional protocol reminders Religious Area → Respectful behavior guidelines Market/Shopping → Bargaining and payment customs Residential Area → Noise levels and privacy norms

docs.title: Emergency Cultural Support
docs.text:
Cultural SOS

Immediate help when you realize you might be in a culturally sensitive situation:

  • Quick Exit Strategies: Polite ways to excuse yourself
  • Damage Control: How to apologize for cultural mistakes
  • Recovery Phrases: What to say when you're unsure
  • Local Help: How to ask for cultural guidance from locals

docs.title: Voice-Activated Assistance
docs.text:
Discreet help when you need it most:

"Hey VibeGuide, how do I politely end this conversation?"
"What's the appropriate tip here?"
"Is it okay to take photos in this place?"

docs.title: Visual Recognition Support
docs.text:
Point your camera for instant cultural context:

  • Menu Translation with cultural dining notes
  • Sign Interpretation with behavioral implications
  • Dress Code Analysis for venues and events
  • Gift Shop Guidance for appropriate souvenirs

docs.title: Conversation Coaching
docs.text:
Real-time support during interactions:

Pre-ConversationDuring ConversationPost-Conversation
  • Cultural context briefing
  • Appropriate topics and taboos
  • Expected interaction length
  • Proper greeting and farewell
  • Subtle prompts for cultural awareness
  • Topic transition suggestions
  • Non-verbal cue interpretations
  • Timing guidance for responses
  • Cultural analysis of the interaction
  • Learning points for future encounters
  • Relationship building suggestions
  • Follow-up protocol guidance

docs.title: Adaptive Notifications
docs.text:
The system learns your preferences:

  • Notification Frequency: From minimal to comprehensive
  • Learning Style: Visual, auditory, or text-based
  • Confidence Level: More or less cultural hand-holding
  • Situation Types: Focus on business, social, or tourist scenarios

docs.title: Progress-Based Guidance
docs.text:
As you become more culturally fluent:

Graduated Guidance

Beginner: Detailed step-by-step cultural instructions

Intermediate: Key reminders and cultural context

Advanced: Subtle insights and cultural nuances

docs.title: Invisible Assistance
docs.text:
Real-time guidance designed to be unobtrusive:

  • Smartwatch Integration: Gentle vibrations with cultural cues
  • Earpiece Compatibility: Audio guidance without obvious phone use
  • Subtle Visual Cues: Screen notifications that look like regular messages
  • Offline Mode: Essential guidance without internet connectivity

docs.title: Privacy Protection
docs.text:
Your Privacy Matters

  • Location data processed locally when possible
  • No recording of conversations or interactions
  • Cultural insights based on general location, not specific tracking
  • User control over all data sharing preferences

docs.title: Cultural Weather
docs.text:
Daily cultural climate updates:

Today's Cultural Weather in Bangkok:
🌡️ Formality Level: Medium-High (business district)
🎭 Social Energy: Moderate (post-lunch period)  
⚠️ Cultural Alerts: Avoid pointing feet toward Buddha images
💡 Opportunity: Great day for temple visits (cooler weather)

docs.title: Crowd-Sourced Insights
docs.text:
Real-time updates from the VibeGuide community:

  • Recent Experiences: What other users learned today
  • Cultural Shifts: Temporary changes in local customs
  • Event Impacts: How local events affect cultural norms
  • Seasonal Updates: Current cultural practices vs. guidebook info

docs.title: Integration Capabilities
docs.text:
Connect with your travel ecosystem:

Calendar IntegrationMaps IntegrationTranslation Apps
  • Pre-meeting cultural briefings
  • Event-appropriate behavior reminders
  • Cultural preparation time blocking
  • Cultural context for destinations
  • Route planning with cultural considerations
  • Alternative suggestions for cultural experiences
  • Cultural context for translated phrases
  • Appropriate usage situations
  • Non-verbal communication supplements

docs.title: Making the Most of Real-Time Guidance
Best Practices
docs.text:
1. Enable Location Services: For the most relevant insights
  2. Set Appropriate Notifications: Balance helpfulness with discretion
  3. Practice Offline: Download key guidance for connectivity gaps
  4. Provide Feedback: Help improve real-time accuracy

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
Common Issues

GPS Not Working? Use manual location entry for cultural context

Too Many Notifications? Adjust sensitivity in settings

Guidance Too Basic? Update your cultural competency level

Missing Local Customs? Contribute insights to help others

Real-time guidance transforms every moment abroad into a learning opportunity, helping you navigate cultural situations with confidence and respect.

docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
docs.text: Find quick answers to common questions about VibeGuide AI. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

docs.title: What is VibeGuide AI?
docs.text: VibeGuide AI is your personal AI-powered cultural interpreter that helps you navigate social situations, understand local customs, and travel with confidence anywhere in the world. Unlike traditional guidebooks that focus on places to visit, we focus on how to interact respectfully and authentically with people from different cultures.

docs.title: How is VibeGuide AI different from other travel apps?
docs.text:
Key Differences

Traditional Travel Apps: Tell you what to see and do

VibeGuide AI: Teaches you how to experience cultures respectfully and authentically

  • AI-Powered: Personalized insights based on your specific situation
  • Cultural Focus: Deep understanding of social norms and etiquette
  • Real-Time: Contextual guidance based on your location and circumstances
  • Learning-Oriented: Builds your cultural intelligence over time

docs.title: Is VibeGuide AI free to use?
docs.text:
We offer both free and premium tiers:

Free TierPremium Tier
  • Basic cultural insights
  • Limited daily queries
  • Essential offline content
  • Community access
  • Unlimited AI conversations
  • Real-time location-based guidance
  • Advanced cultural intelligence features
  • Priority support
  • Comprehensive offline packs

docs.title: How accurate is the cultural information?
docs.text:
Our cultural insights are:

  • Expert-Reviewed: Validated by regional cultural experts
  • Research-Based: Built on anthropological studies and academic research
  • Community-Verified: Confirmed by real user experiences
  • Continuously Updated: Regularly refreshed as cultures evolve

Cultural Complexity

We acknowledge that culture isn't monolithic. Our AI accounts for regional variations, generational differences, and individual preferences while providing general guidance.

docs.title: Can I use VibeGuide AI offline?
docs.text:
Yes! You can download cultural packs for offline use:

  • ✅ Essential etiquette guidelines
  • ✅ Common cultural scenarios
  • ✅ Emergency cultural phrases
  • ❌ Real-time AI conversations (requires internet)
  • ❌ Location-specific insights (requires GPS + internet)

docs.title: What languages does VibeGuide AI support?
docs.text:
Currently available in: - English (primary) - Spanish - French - German - Japanese - Mandarin Chinese

More languages coming soon based on user demand.

docs.title: How does the AI learn about my preferences?
docs.text:
VibeGuide AI personalizes your experience through:

  1. Initial Setup: Your travel style and cultural background
  2. Usage Patterns: Types of situations you ask about most
  3. Feedback: Your ratings of advice accuracy and helpfulness
  4. Learning Progress: Your growing cultural competency over time

Privacy First

All personalization happens with your explicit consent. You control what data is used and can reset your preferences anytime.

docs.title: What devices are supported?
docs.text:
VibeGuide AI works on:

Mobile AppsWeb ApplicationIntegrations
  • iOS: iPhone 12 and newer, iOS 15+
  • Android: Android 8.0+, 4GB RAM recommended
  • Chrome: Version 90+
  • Firefox: Version 88+
  • Safari: Version 14+
  • Edge: Version 90+
  • Smartwatch: Apple Watch, Wear OS
  • Voice Assistants: Siri Shortcuts, Google Assistant

docs.title: How much data does the app use?
docs.text:
Data usage varies by feature:

  • Text-based queries: ~1-5KB per interaction
  • Voice interactions: ~50-100KB per query
  • Image analysis: ~200-500KB per photo
  • Real-time guidance: ~10-20KB per location update
  • Offline pack downloads: 50-200MB per country

docs.title: Is my data secure?
docs.text:
Security & Privacy

  • End-to-end encryption for all personal data
  • Local processing when possible to minimize data transmission
  • No conversation recording - we don't store your actual conversations
  • GDPR compliant with full data portability and deletion rights
  • Regular security audits by third-party security firms

docs.title: What if the cultural advice doesn't match my experience?
docs.text:
Cultural experiences can vary! Here's what to do:

  1. Provide Feedback: Rate the advice and share your experience
  2. Ask for Clarification: Request more specific guidance for your situation
  3. Consider Context: Regional, generational, or individual variations may apply
  4. Trust Your Instincts: Use our guidance as a starting point, not absolute rules

docs.title: How do I handle cultural mistakes?
docs.text:
Mistake Recovery

Cultural mistakes happen to everyone! VibeGuide AI can help you:

  • Recognize when you might have made a cultural misstep
  • Apologize appropriately in the local cultural context
  • Learn from the experience for future interactions
  • Move Forward without letting mistakes discourage cultural exploration

docs.title: Can VibeGuide AI help with business culture?
docs.text:
Absolutely! We provide specialized guidance for:

  • Meeting protocols and expectations
  • Communication styles (direct vs. indirect)
  • Hierarchy and respect customs
  • Networking and relationship building
  • Gift-giving and entertainment customs
  • Email and follow-up etiquette

docs.title: The app isn't providing location-based insights
docs.text:
Check these common issues:

  1. Location Services: Ensure GPS is enabled for VibeGuide AI
  2. Internet Connection: Real-time insights require connectivity
  3. App Permissions: Grant location access in device settings
  4. Background Refresh: Enable background app refresh (iOS) or disable battery optimization (Android)

docs.title: I'm not receiving notifications
docs.text:
Verify notification settings:

  1. App Notifications: Enable in VibeGuide AI settings
  2. Device Settings: Allow notifications in system settings
  3. Do Not Disturb: Check if DND mode is blocking notifications
  4. Notification Preferences: Adjust frequency and types in app settings

docs.title: The AI responses seem generic
docs.text:
To get more personalized advice:

  1. Provide More Context: Include specific details about your situation
  2. Update Your Profile: Ensure your cultural background and preferences are current
  3. Use Specific Queries: Ask about particular scenarios rather than general questions
  4. Give Feedback: Rate responses to help the AI learn your preferences

docs.title: How do I upgrade to Premium?
docs.text:
1. Open VibeGuide AI app
  2. Go to Settings → Subscription
  3. Choose your preferred plan
  4. Complete payment through your device's app store

docs.title: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
docs.text:
Yes! You can cancel anytime:

  • iOS: Through App Store subscriptions
  • Android: Through Google Play subscriptions
  • Web: Through your account settings

Your premium features remain active until the end of your billing period.

docs.title: Do you offer refunds?
docs.text:
We offer refunds within 30 days of purchase if:

  • Technical issues prevent app usage
  • The service doesn't meet your expectations
  • Accidental purchases

Contact support@vibeguide.ai for refund requests.

docs.title: Still Need Help?
docs.text:
Can't Find Your Answer?

Community Forum: community.vibeguide.ai

Email Support: support@vibeguide.ai

Live Chat: Available in-app during business hours

Response Time: We typically respond within 24 hours

We're here to help you navigate the world with cultural confidence! 🌍
